mapper.select: select out_wh_type as status, count(out_wh_type) as totalCount from ope_out_whouse_order whorder where whorder.dr=0 and whorder.out_wh_status in (0,10,15) group by status

select out_type as status, count(out_type) as totalCount from ope_out_whouse_order whorder where whorder.dr = 0 and out_wh_type = #{type} and whorder.out_wh_status in (0, 10, 15) and whorder.out_wh_status in (15, 20) group by status

select whorder.id as id, whorder.out_wh_no as outboundNo, whorder.out_wh_status as status, whorder.out_wh_type as productType, whorder.out_type as orderType, whorder.out_wh_qty as qty from ope_out_whouse_order whorder
order by whorder.created_time asc

select whorder.id as id, whorder.out_wh_no as outboundOrderNo, whorder.out_wh_status as status, whorder.out_wh_qty as stockTotal, whorder.already_out_wh_qty as qcQty, whorder.out_wh_type as productType from ope_out_whouse_order whorder where whorder.dr = 0 and whorder.id=#{id}

select partB.id as id, partB.parts_id as productId, partB.parts_name as productName, partB.parts_no as productN, '3' as productType, partB.qty as stockTotal, part.id_calss as idclass, partB.already_out_wh_qty as qcQty from ope_out_wh_parts_b partB inner join ope_production_parts part on partB.parts_id = part.id and part.dr = 0 where partB.dr = 0 and partB.out_wh_id =#{id}

select combinB.id as id, combinB.production_combin_bom_id as productId, combinB.combin_name as productName, combin.bom_no as productN, '2' as productType, combinB.qty as stockTotal, combinB.already_out_wh_qty as qcQty, true as idclass from ope_out_wh_combin_b combinB inner join ope_production_combin_bom combin on combinB.production_combin_bom_id = combin.id and combin.dr = 0 where combinB.dr = 0 and combinB.out_wh_id =#{id}

select scooterB.id as id, scooterB.color_id as colorId, color.color_name as colorName, color.color_value as colorValue, scooterB.group_id as groupId, spgroup.group_name as groupName, scooterB.qty as stockTotal, scooterB.already_out_wh_qty as qcQty, '1' as productType, true as idclass from ope_out_wh_scooter_b scooterB left join ope_specificat_group spgroup on scooterB.group_id = spgroup.id and spgroup.dr = 0 left join ope_color color on color.id = scooterB.color_id and color.dr = 0 where scooterB.dr=0 and scooterB.out_wh_id = #{id}

select scooterB.id as id, scooterB.group_id as groupId, spgroup.group_name as groupName, scooterB.color_id as colorId, color.color_name as colorName, color.color_value as colorValue, qty as stockTotal, already_out_wh_qty as qcQty, 1 as productType from ope_out_wh_scooter_b scooterB left join ope_specificat_group spgroup on scooterB.group_id = spgroup.id and spgroup.dr = 0 left join ope_color color on color.id = scooterB.color_id and color.dr = 0 where scooterB.dr=0 and scooterB.id=#{id}

select combinB.id as id, combinB.production_combin_bom_id as productId, combinB.combin_name as productName, combinB.qty as stockTotal, combinB.already_out_wh_qty as qcQty, combin.bom_no as productN, combin.en_name as productName, 2 as productType from ope_out_wh_combin_b combinB left join ope_production_combin_bom combin on combinB.production_combin_bom_id = combin.id and combin.dr = 0 where combinB.dr = 0 and combinB.id=#{id}

select partB.id as id, partB.parts_id as productId, partB.parts_name as productName, partB.parts_no as productN, partB.qty as stockTotal, partB.already_out_wh_qty as qcQty, 3 as productType, partB.parts_type as productionType from ope_out_wh_parts_b partB left join ope_production_parts part on partB.parts_id = part.id and part.dr = 0 where partB.dr = 0 and partB.id=#{id}

select serial.id as id, serial.order_b_id as orderBId, serial.serial_num as serialN, serial.arrival_time as arrivalDate, serial.lot as lot, serial.qty as qty from ope_order_serial_bind serial left join ope_out_wh_scooter_b scooterB on serial.order_b_id = scooterB.id and serial.order_type = 4 where serial.dr=0 and serial.order_b_id =#{id}

select serial.id as id, serial.order_b_id as orderBId, serial.serial_num as serialN, serial.arrival_time as arrivalDate, serial.lot as lot, serial.qty as qty from ope_order_serial_bind serial left join ope_out_wh_combin_b combinB on serial.order_b_id = combinB.id and serial.order_type = 4 where serial.dr=0 and serial.id=#{id}

select serial.id as id, serial.order_b_id as orderBId, serial.serial_num as serialN, serial.arrival_time as arrivalDate, serial.lot as lot, serial.qty as qty, supplier.id as supplierId, supplier_name as supplierName, qcitem.annex as annex from ope_order_serial_bind serial left join ope_production_parts part on serial.product_id = part.id and serial.product_type = 3 and part.dr = 0 left join ope_supplier supplier on supplier.id = part.supplier_id and supplier.dr = 0 left join ope_order_qc_item qcitem on qcitem.order_serial_id = serial.id and qcitem.dr = 0 and qcitem.qc_result = 1 where serial.dr = 0 and serial.orderBId =#{id}
